Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Application Insights to continuously monitor the health and performance of APIs hosted in API Management. Identify and resolve any anomalies or performance bottlenecks.
Review and update security policies, including authentication, authorization, and rate-limiting rules, to ensure APIs are protected against unauthorized access and abuse.
Regularly back up API configurations, including policies, settings, and customizations, to ensure recovery in case of accidental changes or data loss.
Review access logs to ensure compliance with security policies and identify any suspicious activity or unauthorized access attempts.
Conduct failover tests to verify that redundant systems and backup mechanisms function correctly in case of primary API Management service failures.
Ensure API documentation is up-to-date, including endpoint details, usage instructions, and examples, to assist developers and users.
Analyze the performance of the API gateway to ensure it is operating within expected parameters. Address any latency or throughput issues.
Regularly rotate keys and credentials used in API Management to enhance security and reduce the risk of key compromise.
Perform incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or API outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Analyze API usage data to identify trends, optimize performance, and ensure APIs are meeting user needs effectively.

Tasks.Task: Plan for API Updates and Expansions
Tasks.Task Description: Develop and execute plans for updating or expanding APIs hosted in API Management. Ensure minimal disruption during these activities.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new API Management features, best practices, and security measures.
Conduct regular audits of API gateway configurations to ensure alignment with documented architecture and best practices.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding API performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
